content: materials - color a 5 7 13 skeins of purl soho s gentle giant 1 100% merino wool each skein is 48 yards/ 125 grams approximately 240 336 624 yards required we used the color heirloom white - color b 2 3 6 skeins of gentle giant approximately 96 144 288 yards required we used the color purple lupine note this color is no longer available - us 19 15 mm 32-inch circular needles 2 - a set of us 17 12 mm double pointed needles 3 gauge 4¾ stitches = 4 inches in stitch pattern sizes baby crib throw - finished dimensions 24 x 36 30 x 45 40 x 60 inches sample we knit the baby size 1 https //www purlsoho com/gentle-giant html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--circular_needles html 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--double_pointed_needles html
